item.title: My First Post
item.description: Survived one year in the ServiceNow Ecosystem

item.title: About me
item.description:
Hi there! I’m Stefan Taitano, and welcome to my corner of the internet. This site is a space where I share my thoughts on technology, chess, productivity, and more. It’s also a hub for my creative projects and interests.

Professionally, I work as a ServiceNow Technical Consultant at Thirdera, where I help organizations streamline and automate their workflows. I’m also proud to lead the up-and-coming ServiceNow Veterans in Tech group, a community initiative that’s launching soon. Before diving into tech, I served in the United States Army as a Fire Control Specialist, taking on roles like Team Lead, Program Manager, and Retention Manager. These days, I call Minnesota home.
